title: EYL #151 Bobby Wagner on Negotiating $54 Million Contract
itunes:title: EYL #151 Bobby Wagner on Negotiating $54 Million Contract
description:
Bobby Wagner is one of the greatest players in NFL history. He’s a 7-time pro bowler, he’s been named to 6 first team all-pro teams, he’s a 2-time NFL tackles leader, he was named to the 2010 all-decade team, and he’s a Super Bowl champion. 


His on-field accomplishments are astonishing, but his business acumen is just as impressive. He is his own agent and negotiated his latest contact for $54 million, which made him the highest paid inside linebacker in the league. 


In episode 151, Bobby walks us through the steps of being an agent and negotiating his contract. He also broke down the economic ins and outs of the league and provided a financial insight into the sport that most have no idea about. We also talked about his other investments, businesses, and the wider world of the business of sports. #nfl #bobbyWagner #sportsagent 


EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com


Host IG: https://instagram.com/bankgreenwood?utm_medium=copy_link


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/bwagz?utm_medium=copy_link

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
